website_summaries.verdict: Whether swimming or doing water aerobics, this pair of cost-effective gloves are a perfect addition to the workout routine.
pros: Adds some pizzazz to the usual swimming session by adding weight and resistance
Builds muscle and upper body strength without exacerbating arthritis
Can also use for non-swimming exercise
Easy to put on and take off without tugging
cons: The Velcro doesn’t hold as tightly as some other brands
May wear out a bit faster overall

customer_reviews.title: Wow, just wow.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how easy was to get these gloves. I have been trying to do some exercise by swimming or water aerobics but I would get bored. I attended a local swim club and join their water aerobics course and they recommended the gloves. Wow, what a great addition to my technique. I can definitely feel the increase resistance when using these gloves. good quality and inexpensive, compared to what others talked about. Also, make sure you look at the size. I have regular size hands and had a hard time fitting into the medium size. However, once I used them, my fingers were eventually fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use for pool therapy after rotator cuff surgery. Gloves gives perfect resistance to strengthen shoulder. Therapist provided but I wanted my own due to multiple others using them. Mine ripped after my 2nd PT session. Not bad but I was disappointed to have not gotten more use before it started to rip.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike. The gloves are well made and give a little added resistance for walking and running in water and doing general water aerobics. I may order another pair in small. I have a small hand and should have ordered a small instead of a medium. But I do think they are true to size. I just think a size small would be better for me. But overall I love them and use them at least twice weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in these gloves unfortunately. Purchased this product a month ago for my 12 year old daughter. She used it about maybe 10-15 times the most and the right handed glove is already falling apart. The rubber coating has come off and now the material is flaking apart. The left glove is holding up like I hoped it would though. She of course uses both hands the same way, does nothing different with either glove and yet, they aren't the same. UPDATE: Sent a seller an inquiry about the warranty... they told me I need to contact the manufacturer. Well that wasn't very helpful now was it. Pretty disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: BlueZebra

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a dream and work perfectly. I went large and am very happy I did. I've had them for 2 months and have used them constantly while doing water aerobics in my backyard pool. They are holding up wonderfully. The velcro enables you to fit them to your size well. No problems getting on or off. Will buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: KAF

customer_reviews.title: Second pair
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased these three years ago and they recently started to show wear and the Velcro was not holding. I use them heavily so surprised they held up so well! I tried Speedo and another brand when I decided to get a new pair and the other brands didn't fit right and the speedo also had a terrible chemical odor. I returned the others and reordered these. They fit great and I am sure will last me for the next 2 to 3 years. I am female. I wear a 6 1/2 size glove. The medium fits perfectly . Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: girldoc

customer_reviews.title: Shovels pulling me through the Water.. I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like these gloves. I got the large gloves and they are working well for me. I could have used them slightly larger but that is just me. They fit well and feel like shovels pulling me through the water and helping me to improve my morning workout. I think the quality is great for the price. I have paid more for similar items. I have used them everyday for about 2 weeks and the Velcro seems to be holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Sizing runs small
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work for me because I have small hands; but they are tight even on me. I bought them because they were the best price. The shipping and service were fine, and although I kept the product, I would like it if the small size I ordered wasn't like an extra small. The quality of the fabric is good, but the cut/pattern is tight and small, especially around the wrist. Ordering a size up would be my advice with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Building Muscle Strength
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size women's medium based upon the comments by other purchasers. They are WAY to big. I'd rather see actual glove sizes, rather than the subjective small-medium-large. I wear a size 6 glove, so I guess I should have known. Regardless, they are great for increasing resistance, thereby building muscle, when swimming or exercising in the water. I like the price and quality, and would purchase again, ordering the small size next time.
customer_reviews.author: IdRatherBReading

customer_reviews.title: (disintegrating) swim gloves
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them because someone in my water aerobics class had them. Bad decision, after already about the 4th time I wore them they started coming apart. Been sewing them up but then they start unraveling someplace else. Am now thoroughly disgusted and they just landed in the trash. Will go back to Speedo, which lasted without a problem for about a year (I use them between 4 to 5 times/week all year around).
customer_reviews.author: mvs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old pair -Velcro stopped working. Gloves are tight fitting & Velcro stays on. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Happy girl

customer_reviews.title: Work well, but had problems
customer_reviews.text: The gloves work great. However, the first time I wore them, my right thumb was raw. The second time I wore them, I got a blister on my left hand. I have very small hands so this is quite odd. There will be no 3rd time. By the time I pay postage to send them back, my credit would be $2+. Seems to be if you pay for Prime so you get free shipping, you should get returns for free too.
customer_reviews.author: julia jones

customer_reviews.title: Aqua Sphere Swim Gloves are great addition to swimming !
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great for swimming work-outs! I have already seen a difference in upper arm definition and they offer better overall body work during your swim stroke. The gloves can be used even if you are not swimming, even if you are just doing standing exercises in the pool. They have worked out great for me - the gloves also offer great sun protestion for hands while in an open air pool. I would recommend to others. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: vicki napoli

customer_reviews.title: ... ocean with these babies for years and I absolutely love them. A good plus
customer_reviews.text: I have been swimming for miles in the ocean with these babies for years and I absolutely love them. A good plus, it keeps me safe from any cuts or scrapes due to being close to coral. It also provides a better work out.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: They are great for what they are made for
customer_reviews.text: Only used these daily for a couple weeks and are already ripping out in places. I bought the medium , my fingers barely come to the ends, so it's not that they are to small. But my hands aren't petite either. They are great for what they are made for. I really feel the resistance. I'm just disappointed at how quickly they are falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Stop using Asian Fit Models for your Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Size Large and there was no designation for either men or woman. These gloves are so small, that I started to lose feeling in my hand. I have an average size hand for an American woman. However, with production for the US, you cannot use Asian fit models. Returning item.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves, careful with the sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love these swim gloves! I use them for swimming as well as aqua aerobic classes and they work great for both. The one thing to watch is the sizing. I noticed from other reviews that the sizes ran a bit small, this is true. I bought the large size gloves for myself and they fit great. I am a female with long fingers, but not particularly "large" hands. So this product may be a bit hard for men to find a size that fits, unless they have small hands. But one again great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: swimgirl

customer_reviews.title: This brand of swim gloves is better than any other I tried
customer_reviews.text: This brand of swim gloves is better than any other I tried. Others either don't fit as well or wear out much faster. Great if you wish to swim with added resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice for my AquaFit classes. The give a little extra resistance and makes the workout more efficient. The fit is good and they are easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Salley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE 'EM
customer_reviews.text: Our Aqua Arthritis class instruction suggested swim gloves and when I found these on Amazon I ordered a pair for my sister and myself & we LOVE them. Classmates who bought cheaper items locally wish they'd gotten these. We use them, rinse them with cool water & hang them up to dry and ours have held up wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Very effective swim gloves
customer_reviews.text: I had been using swim gloves from our recreation center for some time and they were all torn. I decided to purchase a pair of my own for my Aqua Zumba class. I was looking for a pair that would add resistance to my training and these have turned out to be very effective. My only small issue is that the velcro on the right glove comes off from time to time and I have to tighten it more. But, it really does the job. I also have small hands and purchased a size medium which fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TacoCat84

customer_reviews.title: cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: one of the rubber side ripped opened that I just use it for swimming, after using it for < 5 times. Maybe it's me pulling the gloves on that it's a bit on the tight side. The ripping part didn't expand to a big hole yet so I assume it'll hold for another 20 times.
customer_reviews.author: j.?

customer_reviews.title: Great for resistance!
customer_reviews.text: I lake swim every day, and these are great. I've even let a few friends try them out and everyone loves them. They really increase resistance and make me swim faster. They even improve my form. I used to swim for at least two hours, but now I can only swim for an hour because I'm so tired! They seem to be building up my shoulder and arm strength. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Runly

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts instead of weights
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure what size to order. These are perfect for me. Only if you have really small hands would you order small. I like using these instead of weights for my aqua aerobics class. I can still get a workout with these without upsetting my sensitive neck.
customer_reviews.author: Packer Girl 32

customer_reviews.title: work great for me
customer_reviews.text: works great, protecting my thumbs from motion of water... self-diagnosed arthritis but won't have to see a doctor cuz these help tremendously! plus add extra resistance in the water for a better workout
customer_reviews.author: ohioJan

customer_reviews.title: nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last fall as I do 3txs a week a water sport class in a pool. I am happy with the fit . For me it could be a little smaller but im gald it not too small and it works well. Im happy for the price and over all
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Swim gloves
customer_reviews.text: Concern that swim gloves are not as tolerant to chlorine as they could be.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The price is definitely right but the quality is not. The gloves faded in color after 2 wearings. Hopefully the rubber will hold up better than the last 2 I purchased (same water glove)
customer_reviews.author: lona Davies

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size large. It's a struggle to get fingers in, the seams stretching ... won't last long. The velcro straps strangle my wrists. If straps aren't stretched the velcro pops off. Then you got a waterlogged feeling, so stop and tighten again. Like Garciaparra of the pool. Large gloves always fit me well. My hands/wrists not particularly big. Dick's has these, or something similar, go there and try em on before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse K. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend using the gloves for anyone who wants to build ...
customer_reviews.text: The gloves really make a difference in adding resistence to swimming laps. The first time I used them, I could only do half my usual number of laps. I recommend using the gloves for anyone who wants to build upper body strength.
customer_reviews.author: Open to great experiences

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to a swim workout.
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves. They are comfortable, dry nicely, there is a bit of a "new car" smell at first, but it wears off after a while. Using them has been like adding dumbells to my swim workout! Loving the results!
customer_reviews.author: Francisca C Wu

customer_reviews.title: Good resistance in pool.
customer_reviews.text: Good resistance. Better for arthritis than dumbbells. You need to move around your hands to find the most resistance.
customer_reviews.author: sleepingbeauty92

customer_reviews.title: these have an adjustable cuff and are very comfortable. I prefer this style more than the rigid ...
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the others I've seen, these have an adjustable cuff and are very comfortable. I prefer this style more than the rigid kind. You feel with the workout without strain. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Quite comfortable and works well
customer_reviews.text: I use these for lap swims and am pleased they are so comfortable. The small size is just a little bit large on my small to medium women's hands. I believe these come in unisex sizes so women do not order large.
customer_reviews.author: Urne Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Need aqua exercise following ankle surgery......
customer_reviews.text: Turns "water walking" into a good workout, thanks to added resistence with these gloves. Can definitely feel it (in a good way) in my shoulders, arms, back, chest, torso. I honestly didn't know fat could hurt. :)
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for water aerobics, the gloves fit nicely around the wrist and also help with sun protection. I think I have an average size hand for a woman and the medium size was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Delpha

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves mediums are really small
customer_reviews.text: Brought these gloves to work out my arms and give resistance while swimming. I thought a medium pair would suffice, I'm a small 5'4" woman with what I consider normal small hands however these gloves are made small and I can't get my fingers all the way through. I'm now going to have to buy the large to see if they fit my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have more resistance when swimming to strengthen my arms and these gloves helped immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Torag

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The small is actually for a child. I have very small hands but had to reorder in a medium. Very good quality. I have used my old pair in water 3 years
customer_reviews.author: Diana Traylor

customer_reviews.title: All in all, a fine fit
customer_reviews.text: They keep my rings on and provide the much needed resistance. I ordered a medium (7.5 glove size). They''re somewhat snug in the fingers and longer then I imagine they should be; but I have no comparison on which to base this.
customer_reviews.author: cl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Notice the Velcro closure
customer_reviews.text: Use in pool 4-5 week Velcro closure, it's even better than the zipped one! Holding up real well. I do rinse with tap water after every use. They are holding their shape and Velcro doing well. Excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Jersey LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I use these for pool aerobics three times a week ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for pool aerobics three times a week and they work perfectly. They are holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Julia B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last as long as I expected. Chlorine in the pool ate them up quick.
customer_reviews.author: Miche

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love therein gloves. They keep your hands warm in colder water
customer_reviews.author: Sandybeachqueen

customer_reviews.title: I expected a product that would last more than 3 months...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gloves in March of 2015. It is now June 2015 and the seams have given out and the rubber is splitting apart leaving little pieces of rubber floating around me. I will try another brand to see if they last longer than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good swimming gloves
customer_reviews.text: They fit my small hands well; I could maybe squeeze into the Small size but these fit quite well. Other than that, they are good webbed swimming gloves, work as advertised, and no problems with the seller shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Very small and tight! I thought they would loosen up but they were very constricting. Seems well made and I have other products by Aqua Sphere that I like. My hands are pretty small and I don't usually have a problem but I ended up giving them to a child.
customer_reviews.author: Jackieb

customer_reviews.title: Great vendor.
customer_reviews.text: These run small. I got a medium but should have gotten a large. Great quality. Very fast service.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Best yet!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent swim gloves! Snug fit, not too tight, accurate measurement instructions. Very easy on and off, and they dry quickly. Looked at three retail locations, and none had even close to these at this price. They give you a great water workout for your upper body and arms. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mickie palatnick

customer_reviews.title: So good everyone wanted a pair!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom, for her water aerobics class. She loves them, even made me buy a few more for her friends in the class.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Miller

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: . I use these for water aerobics classes that I take at the local gym. They have held up pretty well so far. I had another pair of a different brand that didn't hold up very well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: the gloves perform very well... I have purchased several pair over the years and will continue to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Jones

customer_reviews.title: Definitely smaller than usual.
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves at the price I paid. But they are a challenge to get on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: If have small hands (like large kid hands), the small fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I have very small hands and wrists so the small size fit me perfect. Well made and helped me paddle when inner tubing on a river :) I like them!
customer_reviews.author: HVC

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: So far, these gloves are working well for me. The velcro closures are holding up well but the blue neoprene is fading due to the chlorine in the swimming pool. I do like the open fingertips. For the price, I feel that I am receiving good value.
customer_reviews.author: KJ103

customer_reviews.title: He has arthritis in his hands and this was the perfect answer to his paddling problems
customer_reviews.text: My 60 something year old surfer friend loves these. He has arthritis in his hands and this was the perfect answer to his paddling problems.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my hands and these work great when swimming .
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of these. Obviously, I keep coming back. The biggest drawback is that after about 6-8 months of hard use, they start to stretch and don't stay on well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so helpful for exercise sorry second pair never arrived only ...
customer_reviews.text: so helpful for exercise sorry second pair never arrived only the package top!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Fit is good according to size. The only drawback is that the velcro comes loose after swimming a while.
customer_reviews.author: Larry H

customer_reviews.title: Work Well and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am not a very good swimmer, but bought these to help out during lap swimming at a local club. They are comfortable and work well. The gloves are open on the finger tips, but cover my fingers completely with an average size hand.
customer_reviews.author: technojerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect. Helps greatly with resistance when exercising
customer_reviews.author: Laura D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for strengthen your shoulders and arms without using weight and build up stamina for swimming long distance.
customer_reviews.author: Kien

customer_reviews.title: Deteriorate after 5 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: Mine are a little over a month old and they have started to deteriorate. Tried to return and the site indicated that the return window had expired.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Cook

customer_reviews.title: Duck hands
customer_reviews.text: Love em! Really work well. Wish i would have bought the medium but they work just as good. Really like the resistance I get doing water aerobics. Haven't noticed a big difference in doing laps. But overall, I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Love the gloves!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves really add to my wateraerobic workouts! I ordered size medium, should have gone with small, but they still remain in place.
customer_reviews.author: Fmac

customer_reviews.title: Fit me, work well.
customer_reviews.text: These work well and allow me to use my camera as the finger tips are exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Culture Man

customer_reviews.title: ... webbed gloves during water aerobics does not hurt them like the foam buoys do
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in the knuckles in my thumbs and using the webbed gloves during water aerobics does not hurt them like the foam buoys do. Instead they offer support and resistance in the water. I also use them while swimming laps and feel they build up the muscles in my arms.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy glove. EZ to put on and take off. Fingers are not too tight
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I never realized the lack of strength in my upper arms until I wore these. They work really well, and help give a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were made in Asia for people with smaller hands. We repeatedly asked that they be exchanged for an extra large and our request was ignored. They would probably work well if they were the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Good, but could be better. Would like it if they provided a little more resistance. Ordered with Water Aerobics in mind.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for water aerobics at a great price. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Puddle

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value
customer_reviews.text: Great for my water aerobics class. They fit well and are an excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good fit and comfortable. Makes you work hard in the water!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item and quality. Fits perfectly. Came on time. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the gloves it gives me 15% more of a workout when using them in my water aerobics class
customer_reviews.author: P J

customer_reviews.title: have had these for about a month and have used ...
customer_reviews.text: have had these for about a month and have used them about 2 dozen times. The black material on the palms is starting to fall apart. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: TSCALLOWAY

customer_reviews.title: great for strengthening after arm/hand surgery.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for an awesome product and impeccable service. great for strengthening after arm/hand surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz gyrl

customer_reviews.title: falling apart
customer_reviews.text: these gloves are supposed to have a 2 ear limited warranty. They are faded and falling apart and I am going to try to return them if possible...otherwise, i like them, but they do run a bit small around the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl ruhe

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: love these gloves for pool workouts! Great resistance, good fit, secure, don't slip around. Material used is quality and should last for years
customer_reviews.author: rosanne

customer_reviews.title: swim gloves are great for your arm strength.
customer_reviews.text: a friend had let me try their swim gloves and i loved them, and ordered these same ones for myself. love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I like this type of swim glove best and a pair usually lasts me about a year and half to 2 years...........pool swimming about 4 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clinger

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Even though gloves say large they are way too small for my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D Lee

customer_reviews.title: Aqua gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great for resistance swimming in place of pool weights. Run a bit small Arrived on time. Would definately recommend. Pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: AppleGirl

customer_reviews.title: I ordered by the size it says I am, ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered by the size it says I am, but they were way too tight. I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These gloves come a bit higher on my wrists than the previous pairs I have used. They are comfortable and give that added resistance to my water work out.
customer_reviews.author: Norma A Tallon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are great they will wear out after time but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: MSPRICH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better workout and greater propulsion! 5 stars, minus one for off-gassing nasty smelling chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Nunyo Bidnizz

customer_reviews.title: Love em.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy swimming with the gloves. Gives you an arm workout.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Platkin

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I use these gloves several times a week. They hold up well to the chemicals in the pool. They fit well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mommamo17

customer_reviews.title: up the stream with a paddle !
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome in the pool . water aerobics yeah ! fun to swim with too
customer_reviews.author: hagermeister

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't like them at all
customer_reviews.text: didnt feel the resistance at all. fingers not spread enough. Just didn't like them at all. threw them out.
customer_reviews.author: kellydaniels

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well sewn, but to small for my average size hands.
customer_reviews.author: nurseforsure

customer_reviews.title: medium might have been a better fit but they are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have larger hands (female) so I ordered large. medium might have been a better fit but they are comfortable. well made. arrived in time well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: livvnoz

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves--Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: These are fine swim gloves, adding resistance for a better work out--but the "large" size fits only my wife's hands. They are way too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sir B

customer_reviews.title: The gloves cover my entire fingers and are difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: The gloves cover my entire fingers and are difficult to take off in the water and put back on. Otherwise I am enjoying them. They serve two purposes: keep the sun off the back of my hands and give me additional work for my arms and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Berven

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and I am going to order another pair
customer_reviews.text: Wear them every day, as I do water aerobics daily..........They fit great and I am going to order another pair.........Diane Austin
customer_reviews.author: Diane Austin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far but worked well. Finger tips barely protrude but I have short fingers.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these a bit tight so i would buy a size bigger. They make a difference.

product_meta.title: Aqua Sphere Webbed Swim Gloves
product_meta.description: The Swim Glove enhances your workout by providing increased resistance while maintaining mobility of the hand. Available in sizes S, M and L.
feature_bullets: Designed to increase resistance and build strength
